title: Sacha Baron Cohen
summary: Sacha Noam Baron Cohen (born 13 October 1971) is an English actor, comedian, writer, and producer.[1] He is best known for his creation and portrayal of the fictional satirical characters Ali G, Borat Sagdiyev, Br√ºno Gehard, and Admiral General Aladeen. He adopts a variety of accents and guises for his characters and interacts with unsuspecting subjects who do not realise they have been set up. At the 2012 British Comedy Awards, he received the Outstanding Achievement Award and accepted the award in-character as Ali G. In 2013, he received the BAFTA Charlie Chaplin Britannia Award for Excellence in Comedy. In 2018, The Times named him among the 30 best living comedians.
